meanings.definition: Extremely practical or useful in a very efficient way.
meanings.sent1: Her ultrapractical approach to problem-solving saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The ultrapractical tool belt had all the necessary gadgets for the job.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his ultrapractical backpack could fit a whole house inside.
meanings.sent4: The ultrapractical solution was like a magic wand, solving everything instantly.
meanings.sent5: The ultrapractical advice was like a beacon of light in the darkness of confusion.

meanings.definition: Characterized by practicality and efficiency in a high degree.
meanings.sent1: The ultrapractical design of the car maximized fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his ultrapractical approach to time management.
meanings.sent3: The ultrapractical picnic basket seemed to have endless compartments.
meanings.sent4: His ultrapractical mind worked like a well-oiled machine, never wasting a moment.
meanings.sent5: The ultrapractical strategy was a roadmap to success in the business world.
